item.title: Lola Tung, Christopher Briney on Their ‘Summer I Turned Pretty’ Ending and What’s Next
item.description: The stars of Jenny Han’s hit coming-of-age drama break down that passionate and vulnerable series finale, and why they believe Conrad takes “Belly at her word” during that final confession.

item.title: ‘The Summer I Turned Pretty’ Star Gavin Casalegno Reacts to Upcoming Movie and Those Fan Videos of Him Filming in Paris
item.description: The actor also reflects on the wedding that almost was between Jeremiah and Belly and why it could’ve still happened.

item.title: ‘The Summer I Turned Pretty’ Creator Jenny Han Always Intended for That Endgame, Shares Movie Details
item.description: The showrunner behind the hit Prime series says of the series finale leading into the upcoming movie: “I really wanted to give people a real meal, so I hope people feel happy.”

item.title: Lola Tung, Nico Parker to Star in Osgood Perkins’ ‘The Young People’
item.description: The first project under the horror meister’s first look deal with Neon after a collaboration on ‘Longlegs,’ ‘Monkey’ and ‘Keeper’ will be shopped to buyers at the Toronto Film Festival.
